The Parkour cloud was used in the modeling slides of the 2023 Nubis, Cubed presentation. It was also used in the Burning Shores DLC.
The Stormbird Cloud was modeled for the Stormbird encounter.  
You will find TGA and VBD examples of both in the Examples directory.

dimensional_profile: 0-1 range with 0=no cloud and 1=full cloud
detail_type: 0-1 range with 0=wispy and 1=billowy
density_scale: 0-1 ranged scale applied to the result of the upres. 
sdf: signed distance field from the range -256 to 4096 but ranged to 0-1.
